segments.text: This kitchen looks so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is meticulously wiping down her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that faucet's running wild, overflowing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring down the front, making everything soggy and gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is spreading, probably full of who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, unawareâ€” that's just nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing around in this mess too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the cookie jar, but the stool's unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's waiting eagerly, but the whole scene feels unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is neat, which makes the inside sloppiness worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably need washing in that filthy sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing water damage like this; it's so wasteful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets expose everything, adding to the disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy situation they've got going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
